=== About me ===

* Name: Sameer Morar
* Location: Australia
* Contact details: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~smorar|Launchpad profile]]</nowiki>

My name is Sameer Morar and I am originally from South Africa. I have been using GNU/Linux since about 1999, and Ubuntu since 2004.

This page is a place for me to track my contributions to Ubuntu.

==== Ubuntu related Projects ====

During the Natty development cycle, I transitioned python-numpy from version 1.4.1 to 1.5.1 (<nowiki>[[LP:695005]]</nowiki>).
This required me to check that all the packages that build depend on numpy work, and resulted in me having 
to fix a number of build issues with all of these packages. In addition to this, I had to ensure that any packages that depend on python-numpy continued to work after the transition.
